content: not needed it is helpful to place a stitch marker on the first stitch of each round you can change the size of your bunny by changing your yarn and hook size be sure to make a gauge swatch to ensure that your fabric is the correct density so your project is soft and your fiberfill won t show through your stitches cheers - let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns
